LanguageData.BuildGun_AKS74U.label: Build AKS-74U Carbine
LanguageData.BuildGun_AKS74U.description: Builds the AKS-74U Carbine, a shorter and lighter variant of the AKS-74 assault rifle. Good damage and rate of fire, average accurracy and range.\nCaliber: 5.45x39mm
LanguageData.BuildGun_SKS.label: Build SKS
LanguageData.BuildGun_SKS.description: Builds an ancient carabine. Good range, good power and low rate of fire.\nCaliber: 7.62x39mm
